doc.field: New-York Historical Society bequests, gifts and related matters
New-York Historical Society bequests, gifts and related matters

Bequest of family tree, a miniature, and a painting (1953). Gift from St. Luke's Hospital of papers, maps, and account book from the estate that were bequeathed to it (1954). Includes correspondence related to objections raised in court by the executors, with N-YHS's urging, over Stuyvesant's will directing the destruction of certain portraits and other objects; items held on deposit at N-YHS during court process. Gift of objects to N-YHS from the estate following the court decision to not follow will's direction (1956-57).
New-York Historical Society bequests, gifts and related matters
Series I. Bequests to Circa 1960 >> Stuyvesant, Jr., Augustus Van Horne
